code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BlogDetails=()=>{const[blog,setBlog]=useState(null);const[formattedDate,setFormattedDate]=useState("");const{id}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch(`http://localhost:8002/api/get-blog/${id}`);const result=await response.json();console.log("Fetched Data:",result);setBlog(result.data);const createdAt=new Date(result.data.createdAt);const isValidDate=!isNaN(createdAt.getTime());if(isValidDate){const formatted=createdAt.toLocaleDateString("en-US",{year:"numeric",month:"long",day:"numeric"});setFormattedDate(formatted);}}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching data:",error);}};fetchData();},[id]);if(!blog)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"portfolio-blog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:["Author Name: ",blog.auther]}),formattedDate&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:formattedDate}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"portfolio-blog-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`http://localhost:8002/${blog.image}`,alt:blog.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"blog-description",children:blog.decription})]});};export default BlogDetails;
